About the Game

‚óÜStory Background:


Born a nobleman, your love affair with your maid was not allowed, so you took your maid and ran away from your family. You bought an abandoned cottage in a remote area where you would live for the rest of your life; you were determined to roll up your sleeves, develop the land, build your home, and to cope with all kinds of climate changes. You needed to plan for the future...

You should stock up on supplies to protect you from the cold and hunger; in these hard times, your maid, who accompanied you, would work for you during the day and relieve your fatigue at night; in addition, in this world, demons would capture women to breed their offspring. If you saved them from the demons, in return, they would be at your disposal.

‚óÜGameplay Instructions


Collect supplies, plan the farm, build fences, keep livestock, work hard during the day and enjoy the sweet life at night, unlock more content to produce and a variety of ‚Äúsex toys‚Äù and ‚Äúsex positions" step by step. You can even experience making women pregnant in the game.

‚óÜGame Features:


‚óáMore than 30 basic CGs, including more than 150 differentials
‚óáMore than 50 types of synthetic materials, props and construction devices in total
‚óáDozens of special scenes and creatures living in different areas
‚óá3 maps with day and night changes, in which you can roam freely.

data.short_description: Elves‚Äô Sex Farm is a farming game that combines eroticism and business management in a fantasy world where you live a sex-filled life with her. Earn a fortune, collect more women, develop your home and then survive season after season.
data.supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Thai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/ Windows 8/ Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 Support, 2GB GPU RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9.0c compatible

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains severe sexual behaviors such as pregnancy, creature breeding, bestiality, heterosexual rape, and SM.
Those who are under the legal age and unsuitable are not allowed to watch and purchase.
